text: Ojo xaʙari kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudaand, cun qavmi Nuh va Od va Samud va niz kasone, ki ʙa'd az onho ʙudaand, ʙa sumo narasidaast? Ƣajri Xudo kasero az onon ogohi nest. Pajomʙaronason hamroh ʙo daloili ravsan omadand va onho dast ʙar dahon ʙurdandu guftand: Mo ʙa on ci ʙa on amr sudaed, imon nameovarem va dar cize, ki moro ʙa on mexoned, saxt dar suʙha hastem»
